docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; New England Patriots beat Tampa Bay Buccaneers, 25-21, in exhibition game; Patriots quarterback Tom Brady throws 11 straight completions, putting to rest worries about his knee; other scores and football news noted.

headline.main: 11 Straight Completions Calm Fears About Brady

docs.snippet: At training camp, the Giants rely on an equipment staff that handles everything from shoelaces to shaving cream....
docs.lead_paragraph: At training camp, the Giants rely on an equipment staff that handles everything from shoelaces to shaving cream.
docs.abstract: Football players at New York Giants training camp rely on an equipment staff that handles everything from shoelaces to shaving cream; there are about 90 players in each of the 32 NFL training camps this summer, small armies that practice nearly every day and need to be outfitted hour to hour with everything from shower slippers to mouthpieces.

headline.main: For the Giants, a Full-Gear Operation
